data.name: Restoration: Nightmare Chronicles
data.detailed_description:
Oliver and Penello are invited to a creepy mansion owned by a mysterious man named Yenta. Once inside, they find out they aren't the only ones there, but a bunch of
others were invited as well. Suddenly...the lights go out and a dead body appears. The guests are trapped and there is no way out. Every few moments more and more bodies appear. Will you join Oliver and Penello to unravel the mystery and find the identity of the killer? Then read Restoration: Nightmare Chronicles.

*This dlc is not cannon to any of the series and is for pure enjoyment.*
*This dlc is free and won't cost a dime.*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better.
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 643 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
